abstractText: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā containing the fourth khaṇḍa (chapters 38-72). According to the colophon, the manuscript was written in Pātan (Lalitā).
abstractShort: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā containing the fourth khaṇḍa (chapters 38-72).
title: Śatasahasrikā Prajñāparamitā
